name: Web Gliffy Diagrams
description: Gliffy Diagrams is an online diagramming tool that also supports offline use. It helps you easily create flowchart, site map, organization chart and business model diagram. You can make good charts by Google Drive and upload them to the cloud space for free synchronization.

en_US.description: Gliffy Diagrams is an online diagramming tool that also supports offline use. It helps you easily create flowchart, site map, organization chart and business model diagram. You can make good charts by Google Drive and upload them to the cloud space for free synchronization.
en_US.name: Web Gliffy Diagrams

zh_CN.description: Gliffy Diagrams是一款在线图表绘制工具，是Chrome的应用套件之一，并且可以离线使用。Gliffy Diagrams可以让您轻松制作流程图、网站地图、组织架构图以及商业模型图。您可以通过谷歌网盘将制作好的图表上传到云端空间，随时同步处理。
zh_CN.name: Gliffy Diagrams网页版
